Nightlight::

"Aerotaur will be ok, Perplex? are you sure?" said Nightlight while 
tears started to roll down.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Perplex: Nothing bad will happen. Even though we're outnumbered by 
alot of
> furocious opponents, we will overcome the odds like all of the 
other times.
> Burning Hammer will be as good as new, it was just Zero's fault 
that took
> him down...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
